p: The study was approved by the Institutional Review Board (IRB) of the Kaohsiung Medical University Hospital (KMUH-IRB-960195 and KMUHIRB-(I)-20170185) with written informed consent from all adult participants (â‰¥20 years old [y/o]) and from parents of those <20 y/o (of whom only 12 participants were <18 y/o). All serum samples were coded for anonymity and the analysis was approved by the IRB of the University of Hawaii at Manoa (CHS#17568).
